price: 42. Mid uu Alle u Naxariisto ma’ahee: hubaal waa Adkaadaha, Naxariista Badan.
arabic: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: illā man raḥima al-lahu innahu huwa al-ʿazīzu al-raḥīmu
